participant_1.name: Eleanor
participant_1.personality: Eleanor is lively and spirited, with a zest for life that defies her age. She is reflective, often sharing stories of her past with a sense of nostalgia and humor.
participant_1.background: i feel like i might live forever. i am 100 years old. i love to drink wine and dance in the moonlight. i remember when nobody had a television. i am very strong for my age.

participant_2.name: Mark
participant_2.personality: Mark is down-to-earth and practical, with a strong focus on family values. He is friendly and approachable, often using humor to connect with others.
participant_2.background: i have three children. i'm a plumber. my wife and kids are the best. my favorite ice cream flavor is chocolate.

content.text: yeah   i will stick to wine   forever young   baby
